title: Getting started with Red Hat Automation Hub
subtitle: Configuring Red Hat Automation Hub as your default server for Ansible collections content

abstract.para: This guide walks you through the initial steps required to use Red Hat Automation Hub as the default source for certified Ansible collections content.
If you have a suggestion to improve this documentation, or find an error, create an issue at http://issues.redhat.com. Select the Automation Hub (AAH) project and use the Documentation component.
